alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 3:15PM PST until December 23 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 7 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth to one half of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Central Coast Range of Western Oregon and South Willamette Valley. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to 7 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures appear most likely to warm above freezing late Friday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; South Willamette Valley
